title.en: An Aspiration to Request the Safeguarding of Happiness in Tibet

text.en: oṃ āḥ hūṃ vajra guru padma siddhi hūṃ
text.en-trans: om ah hung benza guru pema siddhi hung

text.en: All the victors and their heirs throughout the ten directions and three times,
text.en-trans: chok chu dü sum gyalwa sé ché dang

text.en: But especially the peerless teacher, king of the Śākyas,
text.en-trans: khyepar tönpa nyammé shakyé gyal

text.en: The eight close sons, sthavira hierarchs,
text.en-trans: nyesé gyé dang té rab neten dang

text.en: Six ornaments of this world and two marvellous ācāryas,
text.en-trans: dzamling gyen druk mejung lobpön ché

text.en: Eight vidyādharas, eighty-four mahāsiddhas,
text.en-trans: rigdzin nam gyé drubchen gyechu dang

text.en: And the vidyādhara Padmasambhava who embodies them all,
text.en-trans: kündü rigdzin pema sam bhava

text.en: His eight supreme manifestations and forty secondary emanations,
text.en-trans: tsen chok gyé dang trul tsen zhibchu dang

text.en: As well as the two ḍākinīs, twenty-five disciples,
text.en-trans: daki nam nyi jebang nyishu nga

text.en: Śāntarakṣita, the second lord of sages, Atiśa,
text.en-trans: tubwang nyipa zhitso ati sha

text.en: And all the learned and accomplished vidyādharas of the New and Ancient traditions,
text.en-trans: sar nying khedrub rigpa dzin nam dang

text.en: The hundred emanated treasure-revealers,
text.en-trans: trulpé tertön gya tsa lasokpa

text.en: And all the many millions of vidyādhara gurus,
text.en-trans: rigdzin lama jewa saya dang

text.en: As well as the inconceivable maṇḍalas of peaceful and wrathful deities
text.en-trans: gyüdé zhi dang khyepar drubdé gyé

text.en: Of the four classes of tantra, especially the eight sādhana classes,
text.en-trans: palchen ka dü lama gongpa dü

text.en: The glorious Assembled Word, Embodiment of the Guru’s Intention,
text.en-trans: do dang gyutrul dü kyi khorlo sok

text.en: Sūtra Combining All Intentions, Illusory Net, Wheel of Time and so on,
text.en-trans: zhi dang trowö kyilkhor samyé dang

text.en: Noble Tārā, who is swift and valiant,
text.en-trans: jetsün drolma nyurma pamö zhab

text.en: Vajravārāhī, Siṃhamukhā, vīras of the three domains,
text.en-trans: pakmo seng dong né sum pawo dang

text.en: And all the thousands and millions of glorious yoginīs,
text.en-trans: naljorma pal jewa bumtrak tsok

text.en: As well as the five classes of Gönpo and Maning and Shingkyong,
text.en-trans: gön chen dé nga maning zhing kyong dang

text.en: The Mantra Protectress, Rāhula, Damchen Dorje Lekpa,
text.en-trans: ngaksung khyabjuk damchen dorjé lek

text.en: The thirty commanders of the haughty spirits, and so on,
text.en-trans: drekpé depön sumchu lasokpa

text.en: All the oath-bound ones of the three tantra classes, together with their retinues, the hosts of arrogant spirits,
text.en-trans: gyü sum damchen drek tsokkhor ché dang

text.en: And the seventy-five lords of pure lineage,
text.en-trans: tsangri gönpo dünchu tsa nga ché

text.en: Together with Vaiśravaṇa, Jambhala, and an ocean of wealth deities,
text.en-trans: namsé dzam lha norlha gyatso dang

text.en: As well as the Five Sisters of Long Life, Tenma goddesses, deities of the upper slopes,
text.en-trans: tsering ché nga tenma gul lha sok

text.en: And all those guardians of virtue who delight in the teachings,
text.en-trans: ten la gawé karchok kyong nam dang

text.en: Together with local protectors and the great keepers of treasures, and the rest—
text.en-trans: né dang ter gyi dakpo ché nam sok

text.en: In short, we invoke the compassion of the infinite deities of the Three Roots,
text.en-trans: dorna tsa sum rabjam tukjé dang

text.en: As well as their blessings, power and strength and the force of truth.
text.en-trans: jinlab tutob denpé tsal truk té

text.en: Now that we have reached the end of this period of fivefold degeneration,
text.en-trans: nyikma nga dö ta la tukpa yi

text.en: The sun of happiness is setting upon the teachings and beings;
text.en-trans: ten dang drowé dekyi nyi nyur tsam

text.en: Holders of the teachings and benefactors have been reduced
text.en-trans: tendzin kyé dang tenpé jindak nam

text.en: To the ranks of common folk and lost their authority and influence;
text.en-trans: mang su beb shing ngatang trokpa dang

text.en: And the curative Wheel of Dharma is on the verge of destruction.
text.en-trans: chökhor nyenpo jik la nyewé na

text.en: Have all of you lost the power of your noble aspirations?
text.en-trans: khyé nam tukkyé nüpa zé dam chi

text.en: Can you not hear our fervent prayers of devotion,
text.en-trans: dakchak nyintsen dungshuk drakpo yi

text.en: With which you we call out to you, day and night?
text.en-trans: dé mö soldeb nyen gyi ma sen nam

text.en: Now, let us summon the valorous forces of compassion
text.en-trans: dani tukjé pa tsön rab kyé dé

text.en: To protect what has not been destroyed by the forces of evil,
text.en-trans: nakchok dukpé chompar magyur gang

text.en: For what would be the point of acting only when it’s all no more?
text.en-trans: kyobpa dzö chik chom zin chizhik jé

text.en: Thus, let the might of your activity of the three secrets
text.en-trans: dena sang sum trinlé tsalshuk kyi

text.en: Blaze forth just like the infernos at the end of time, we pray!
text.en-trans: nütu kalpé mé zhin bar du sol

text.en: And since the forceful Guru Padma, in particular,
text.en-trans: khyepar guru pema drakpo yi

text.en: Vowed to afford protection from the terrors of invasion
text.en-trans: bé né gang drakri ling lasokpé

text.en: In hidden lands, snowy peaks and mountain sanctuaries,
text.en-trans: du ru kha yi jik lé kyobwo zhé

text.en: Let us see if this commitment was more than mere falsehood.
text.en-trans: zhalzhé damcha dzün du zé dam chi

text.en: According to the aspirations made in the past
text.en-trans: ngön mön denpé kyebu lama dang

text.en: And the infallible prophecies of gurus and ḍākinīs,
text.en-trans: daki lungten trulmé tebpa yi

text.en: Reveal for us now, swiftly and without hindrance,
text.en-trans: dani nyurdu neyul bepa nam

text.en: The hidden lands wherein holders of the teachings
text.en-trans: kawa mepar jé né tendzin dang

text.en: And faithful men and women may find relief!
text.en-trans: deden kyewo pomö ukyung dzö

text.en: Let Dorje Drolö, king of the wrathful conquerors of Māra,
text.en-trans: dé lé galkyen nyertsé rik tadak

text.en: Who blazes like a fire of red-hot iron,
text.en-trans: dü lé gyalwé trogyal drowolö

text.en: Naturally pacify all forms of harm and adversity and fulfil our every wish,
text.en-trans: drenpé mölé chak sek mé zhindu

text.en: At the very moment that we bring him to mind.
text.en-trans: ngang gi zhi né sampé dön kün drub

text.en: Let Guru Padmākara lead the way,
text.en-trans: guru pejung khyé kyi lam na drong

text.en: The dharma protectors and guardians defend us from behind,
text.en-trans: chökyong sungma nam kyi gyab né kyob

text.en: And all the forces of virtue offer their assistance!
text.en-trans: karchok kyongwa nam kyi drok dzö chik

text.en: May we gain the splendour of victory over Māra,
text.en-trans: dü lé nampar gyalwé pal tob ching

text.en: May our lifespan, merit and resources all increase,
text.en-trans: tsesö dögü jorpa gyepa dang

text.en: And may our qualities of scriptural learning and realization
text.en-trans: lung dang ngönpar tokpé yönten nam

text.en: Develop further and further, just like the waxing moon!
text.en-trans: karpö chok zhin gong né gongpel shok

text.en: May all harmful circumstances in the outer and inner world be pacified,
text.en-trans: nöchü tendrel nyepé tsok kün zhi

text.en: May outer, inner and secret positivity be spontaneously accomplished,
text.en-trans: chi nang sangwé tendrel shuk jung drub

text.en: May all that seems harmful be transformed into virtue and auspiciousness,
text.en-trans: nyé tsok tarnang gé zhing shipar gyur

text.en: And may all be auspicious so that fortune prevails in perfect abundance!
text.en-trans: tendrel pünsum tsokpé tashi shok

text.en: May the Three Jewels and oceanic Three Roots grant their blessings,
text.en-trans: jitar mönpa di zhin drubpa la

text.en: So that this aspiration may be fulfilled just as we wish.
text.en-trans: könchok tsa sum gyatsö jingyi lob

text.en: By the utterly pure nature ofdharmatā—reality-as-such,
text.en-trans: chönyi rangzhin nampar dakpa dang

text.en: And the unfailing interdependence of conditioned things,
text.en-trans: chöchen gyundré tendrel lumé kyi

text.en: May all be brought within our power through the force of truth,
text.en-trans: denpé tob kyi wang du jorpa dang

text.en: And the teachings of the omniscient Victorious One spread far and wide!
text.en-trans: künkhyen gyalwé tenpa dargyé shok
